topline_md: Recent updates in New York City highlight longer police response times, an investigation into NYPD custody deaths, and a significant oil spill affecting traffic. Additionally, a former writer for "The Bear" was arrested on a train, while a man was sentenced for planning an attack on behalf of ISIS.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.summary_md:
